summaryOfNewsArticle: The global economy is showing signs of recovery, with inflation rates stabilizing and investor confidence rising. Central banks, including the Federal Reserve and European Central Bank, have maintained relatively stable interest rate policies, which has helped to sustain financial market stability. China's robust industrial output and steady consumer demand are contributing to global trade growth. However, geopolitical tensions and supply chain disruptions remain key risks. Overall, the economic outlook remains cautiously optimistic, with a focus on sustainable growth and inflation control.
title: Global Economic Recovery Amid Inflation Stabilization and Policy Shifts
